QAPair.Question: What is (are) Hemophilia - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations provide further information on hemophilia : Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/ncbddd/hemophilia/index.html , National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute -- www.nhlbi.nih.gov/health-topics/bleeding-disorders , National Hemophilia Foundation (NHF) -- www.hemophilia.org , World Federation of Hemophilia -- www.wfh.org/en/home ,
